mdRecord.dcterms:title: Trephine set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Schively [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Containing two trephines and other instruments for operations on the skull. Some instruments are stamped "Schively," and the set was likely produced by medical instrument maker Henry Schively II or his son Charles S. Schively. The wooden case is inscribed: "To Doct Tunstall from an obliged patient."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
